Gets all files and their parsed data with the given barcode.

Type: get

Responses

Status code: 200

Media type: application/json

{{ barcode_response_success_example }}

Media type: application/json

Upload a set of files to a particular barcode and return their parsed data.

Type: post

Request

Parameters:

barcode: {string}

Files:

Type: {multipart/form-data}

Contents:

any_name: {application/octet-stream}

any_name: {application/octet-stream}

...

Responses

Status code: 200

Media type: application/json

{{ upload_response_success_format }}
{{ upload_response_success_example }}

Status code: 422

Media type: application/json

{{ invalid_barcode_response_error_format }}
